site.title: Sai — Data Science & ML Portfolio
site.description: Projects and impact across analytics, ML, and BI in automotive retail.
site.author: Sai Chandra Reddy Mandadapu

hero.headline: Data Analyst → Data Scientist
hero.subheadline: I build analytics and ML solutions that drive revenue, optimize inventory, and improve marketing efficiency.

achievements.title: Inventory Optimization Initiative
achievements.detail: Cut stockouts by 18% and reduced aged units.

projects.title: Data Analysis Project
projects.summary: Predict optimal 90-day inventory per trim using market & dealer features (turn rate, DOL, MSRP, demand gap).
projects.impact: ↑ sell-through, ↓ aged inventory, improved capital efficiency

projects.title: Dynamic Pricing Elasticity for Used Cars
projects.summary: Estimated price elasticity by Year/Make/Model using hierarchical models and SHAP for explainability.

projects.title: Marketing Analytics with GA4 + BigQuery
projects.summary: Attribution and VDP funnel analysis; A/B tests for channel mix; Looker Studio dashboards.

projects.title: Service Churn Prediction
projects.summary: Predicted 90-day service defection using visit cadence, spend, and VIN features; targeted offers.
projects.impact: Reduced churn risk in top decile by 15%

projects.title: Accessory Recommender (Cross-sell)
projects.summary: Association rules + matrix factorization to recommend accessories by model and customer behavior.

projects.title: Multivariate Time Series & Anomaly Detection (Fleet)
projects.summary: Forecast sensors and detect anomalies for predictive maintenance; alerting rules.

projects.title: Modern Data Stack: BigQuery + dbt
projects.summary: End-to-end warehouse with staging, marts, tests, and CI; SCD logic and documentation.

bullets: Built inventory demand forecasting and pricing analytics for dealership network.
Integrated CDK, CDP, and GA4 into a central analytics repository.
Developed self-service Excel Google Sheets, Looker Studio reporting for stakeholders.
Transformed SAP ERP data in Snowflake by creating staging, fact, and dimension tables, enabling reliable reporting for material waste analysis for each supplier.
Designed star schema data modeling in Power BI, created calculated columns and measures using DAX formulas, improved 60% automated tracking of production waste and supplier material usage.
Enhanced SQL Server stored procedures using T-SQL to improve financial reporting validation logic, reducing downstream reporting discrepancies by 20%.

Revamped Power BI dashboards connected to JIRA Cloud by redesigning data models, cleaning Power Query tables, and implementing Row-Level Security (RLS), improving KPI accuracy and cutting reporting inconsistencies by 40%.

Developed SQL ETL pipelines to extract data from Oracle ERP systems into data warehouse, enabling downstream analysis for retail, ecommerce and supply chain reporting availability for business stakeholders by 30%.

Built Oracle BI Publisher reports integrated with PL/SQL triggers to automate tracking of EDI order details end to end, reducing manual reporting effort by 20%, accelerating warehouse operations reporting at each stage.

blog.title: From Market Moved to Stock Plan
GA4 to BigQuery: A Practical Guide
